projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
projects.content:
This portfolio website showcases my projects and skills using modern web technologies. It features a responsive design, dark/light mode toggle, and dynamic content loading.

Key Features:

  • Responsive design for all devices
  • Dark/light mode support
  • Dynamic project loading
  • SEO optimized

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A full-stack task management application with real-time updates
projects.content:
A comprehensive task management solution that helps users organize their work efficiently. Built with React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.

Features:

  • Real-time updates
  • Task categorization
  • Priority levels
  • Due date tracking
